1544937960_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUt.body: Convince your friends and family that decentralized services, especially in tecnology, are very important to humanity for remain freedom and continue producing technology. After, show them the various softwares, methods and protocols that promote decentralization, like Tor, Freenet, I2P, Tox, ZeroNet, IPFS...
